class.name: InvokeState
class.description: This class is used by [method GoostEngine.invoke] to manage pending invocations.

method.name: cancel
method.description: Cancels the invocation, preventing the target [member method] from being called.

method.name: is_active
method.description: Tells whether this state is currently processed. If the state is cancelled with [method cancel], then this will return [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_repeating
method.description: Tells whether the [member method] invocation is repeated every [code]repeat_rate[/code] seconds as requested by [method GoostEngine.invoke].

members.member: The method name which is going to be invoked in the [member target] object (read-only).
The target [Object] where the [member method] is going to be invoked (read-only).
The total time left before the target method is called (read-only).

signal.name: completed
signal.description: Emitted when the [member method] is successfully called without errors. This signal is not emitted if the invocation is configured as repeating, see [method is_repeating].

signal.name: post_call
signal.description: Emitted after the [member method] is called.

signal.name: pre_call
signal.description: Emitted when the [member method] is about to be called.
